// components/Donation.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Donation = ({ navigateTo }) => { const [showIncomeForm, setShowIncomeForm] = useState(false); const [showExpenseForm, setShowExpenseForm] = useState(false); const [transactions, setTransactions] = useState([]); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ type: '', month: '', category: '' }); const stats = { totalIncome: 0, totalExpense: 0, balance: 0, monthlyIncome: 0, monthlyExpense: 0 }; const toggleForm = (formType) => { if (formType === 'income') { setShowIncomeForm(!showIncomeForm); setShowExpenseForm(false); } else if (formType === 'expense') { setShowExpenseForm(!showExpenseForm); setShowIncomeForm(false); } }; const handleSubmitIncome = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle income form submission alert('Data pemasukan berhasil disimpan! (Demo Mode)'); setShowIncomeForm(false); }; const handleSubmitExpense = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle expense form submission alert('Data pengeluaran berhasil disimpan! (Demo Mode)'); setShowExpenseForm(false); }; const handleFilterChange = (field, value) => { setFilters(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; return (

Bulan ini: Rp {stats.monthlyExpense.toLocaleString('id-ID')}
Saldo Tersisa
Rp {stats.balance.toLocaleString('id-ID')}
Per {new Date().toLocaleDateString('id-ID')}
{/* Income Form */} {showIncomeForm && (

)} {/* Filters */}
handleFilterChange('month', e.target.value)} />

{transaction.title}
{transaction.date} â€¢ Kategori: {transaction.category}

{transaction.description}

{transaction.type === 'income' ? '+' : '-'} Rp {transaction.amount.toLocaleString('id-ID')}
)) )}
); }; export default Donation;
